title: Geometry of integrable systems related to the restricted Grassmannian
abstract:
A hierarchy of differential equations on a Banach Lie--Poisson space related
to the restricted Grassmannian is studied. Flows on the groupoid of partial
isometries and on the restricted Grassmannian are described, and a momentum map
picture is presented.
subjects: Nonlinear Sciences/Exactly Solvable and Integrable Systems
